Class StatHandler

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.nbt.StatHandler
public final class StatHandler extends NBTHandler<de.tr7zw.changeme.nbtapi.NBTCompound>
StatHandler for statistic related NBT data. Keeps track of every statistic and periodically saves it to disk.
Since:
1.0.0

    • removeContainer

      public static void removeContainer(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      Removes given block from the player's statistic, while also decrementing the global block count. Also takes care of special blocks, like doors.
      Since:
      1.0.3

    • getStatistic

      public static void getStatistic(@NotNull @NotNull BukkitStatistic<?> statistic)
